tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE user_activity (
  user_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  activity_type VARCHAR(255),
  activity_timestamp TIMESTAMP,
  activity_details JSON
)

CREATE TABLE Users (user_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  username VARCHAR(50),
  email VARCHAR(100),
  registration_date TIMESTAMP)

CREATE TABLE UserActivity (activity_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  user_id UUID,
  activity_type VARCHAR(50),
  activity_timestamp TIMESTAMP,
  FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES Users(user_id))

CREATE TABLE Users (user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
              username TEXT,
              email TEXT,
              age INT,
              gender TEXT,
              location TEXT);

CREATE TABLE UserActivity (activity_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
              user_id INT,
              timestamp TIMESTAMP,
              activity_type TEXT,
              activity_details TEXT);

CREATE TABLE Offers (offer_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
              offer_name TEXT,
              offer_description TEXT,
              offer_type TEXT,
              offer_discount FLOAT);

CREATE TABLE Recommendations (recommendation_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
              user_id INT,
              recommendation_type TEXT,
              recommended_item_id INT,
              timestamp TIMESTAMP);

CREATE TABLE users (
  user_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  username VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  email VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE user_activity (
  activity_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  user_id UUID REFERENCES users(user_id),
  activity_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  activity_timestamp TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE user_preferences (
  preference_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  user_id UUID REFERENCES users(user_id),
  preference_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE offers (
  offer_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  offer_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  offer_description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE recommendations (
  recommendation_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  user_id UUID REFERENCES users(user_id),
  recommendation_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  recommendation_description TEXT
)
